scripts.build: yarn minify || npm run minify; electron-packager . anonymous-input
scripts.test: yarn minify || npm run minify; (yarn disable-obfuscation; mocha; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; mocha; npm run enable-obfuscation;)
scripts.manual-test: yarn minify || npm run minify; (yarn disable-obfuscation; yarn start; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; npm run start; npm run enable-obfuscation;);
scripts.disable-obfuscation: mv dictionary.js dictionary_disabled.js || true; mv obfuscationMapping.js obfuscationMapping_disabled.js || true;
scripts.enable-obfuscation: mv dictionary_disabled.js dictionary.js || true; mv obfuscationMapping_disabled.js obfuscationMapping.js || true;
